panels.title: Eat Like a Local and Save More
panels.text:
Eating locally is one of the easiest ways to explore culture on a budget.
Travelers can also cut food costs by preparing simple meals if their accommodation has a kitchen.
panels.subTitle: Budget dining hacks:

list.text: Walk a few streets away from tourist hotspots
Grab fresh snacks from local markets

panels.footer: Authenticity tastes better and costs less.

panels.title: Start Your Budget-Savvy Adventure Today
panels.text:
Budget travel isn’t about cutting corners, it’s about making smarter choices.
With the right strategies, travelers can stretch their money while expanding their experiences.
panels.footer: Every step becomes part of a smarter, more affordable adventure.
